sys_pd_lane.description: approvals and verification of penny test
sys_pd_lane.label: Penny processing

sys_pd_lane.description: send notification to business or procurement there is a new vendor request
sys_pd_lane.label: Update Business or Procurement

sys_variable_value.value: Prompts for confirmation of email subject and body before sending.

sys_pd_activity.description: review of retention package. Approval status needs to be approved or reject.
sys_pd_activity.label: Manager Approve/Reject
sys_pd_activity.name: instruction

sys_variable_value.value: this email is to notify treasury that the penny test is ready.
Prompts for confirmation of email subject and body before sending.

sys_pd_activity.label: Place a call to the vendor
sys_pd_activity.name: placeholder

sys_pd_activity.description: Verify that all required attachments have been provided and are correctly completed.
sys_pd_activity.label: Review submission
sys_pd_activity.name: instruction

sys_pd_activity.description: following a confirmation email that the penny test is complete, VM changes/updates Vendor banking information in SAP
sys_pd_activity.label: Email confirmation from vendor
sys_pd_activity.name: instruction

sys_pd_activity.description: treasury is to complete the penny test.
sys_pd_activity.label: Complete penny test
sys_pd_activity.name: instruction_1

sys_pd_activity.description: following the call to the vendor, please update the status.
sys_pd_activity.label: Update vendor contact status
sys_pd_activity.name: instruction

sys_pd_activity.description: VM electronically stamps completed, and saves retention package with additional penny test information in the shared mailbox and shared folder
sys_pd_activity.label: Mark complete
sys_pd_activity.name: instruction_2

sys_pd_activity.description: If all documents and information is complete send to manager for approval.
sys_pd_activity.label: Assign approver
sys_pd_activity.name: update_record

sys_pd_activity.description: If the new vendor is an Avantis vendor, it will take 10-15 minutes for the push from SAP to Avantis.
sys_pd_activity.label: Create Vendor
sys_pd_activity.name: placeholder

sys_pd_activity.description: VM notifies Vendor of changes in bank information in SAP.
sys_pd_activity.label: Vendor notification of changes
sys_pd_activity.name: instruction_1
